scene_description_enriched: A group of men, depicted with beards and long hair, are gathered together. They are dressed in flowing robes of blue and tan, some with decorative borders. One man in a tan robe points with his index finger. The background features a blue sky filled with scattered golden clouds, and a band of colorful, tiled architecture or a patterned wall behind the figures. The ground is a vibrant green, suggesting an outdoor setting.
